::Hot Rod::

He stoped and turned to Feline, in a deserted hall.
"Now where to start." He was silent for a minute.
"You and me shared something big. I dont know how much you felt, but to
me, you were the 'one'. We wanted to be together. I loved you."
He stoped, the corrected himself.
"I still do. I love you!"
